title: Assasins feel very niche pick and do not feel that great atm.
body:
These points are arguable but I am going to say them anyway

-They are useless if they cannot kill the high priority targets (Usually mid or adc)
-They have a decent amount of counter play
-Regular mages and fighters do just as much damage as assassins
-Some assassins are very spell based and if they use all there spells they are really useless. 
-With the introduction of leathality, I think assassins were nerfed because ADCs are typically lower levels then the assassins and it might be harder to assassinate them because of how leathality scales off of champion levels. 
-some champions make assassins useless. 

Your thoughts on assassins?

replies.body: i rather have champs be NICHE picks instead of the mainstay in the game... every champ should have a pro and con for picking them

Emphasis on very niche.

The thing is champions like {{champion:1}} can kill mid laners and adc better then {{champion:238}} {{champion:91}} {{champion:107}} in quite a few situation so there is not to great of a reason to pick these assassins. There is too many cons for these champs to justify picking them over other classes of champions.
and there are cons to picking {{champion:1}}
Yes, there are cons for picking Annie but there are less cons for picking Annie then the assassins. And not just Annie but a lot of other champions too.
yet prior to the class rework there was no con to pick an assassin
My thoughts on assassins are, don't even bother with any of them. Pick a diver or a burst mage instead.
